languages.text: "Разве положена благодарность за то, что делаешь что должно? Без твоей благодарности они поступали бы иначе?.. Надеюсь, нет".

traits.locale_text: "Положение, о котором ты говоришь — это инструмент, что позволяет тебе больше в служении Неумирающему. В следовании своей стезе. В делах твоих оставишь вечный след и память по себе".

languages.text: "Does one merit gratitude for doing what their duty demands? Would these people act differently without your show of appreciation? I hope that is not the case."
languages.original_text: "Разве положена благодарность за то, что делаешь что должно? Без твоей благодарности они поступали бы иначе?.. Надеюсь, нет".

traits.locale_text: "Does one merit gratitude for doing what their duty demands? Would these people act differently without your show of appreciation? I hope that is not the case."
"Does one merit gratitude for doing what their duty demands? Would these people act differently without your show of appreciation? I hope that is not the case."
"Does one merit gratitude for doing what their duty demands? Would these people act differently without your show of appreciation? I hope that is not the case."
"Status is merely a tool for walking one's way. It is your deeds that will forever be your mark and memory."
"Does one merit gratitude for doing what their duty demands? Would these people act differently without your show of appreciation? I hope that is not the case."
"Does one merit gratitude for doing what their duty demands? Would these people act differently without your show of appreciation? I hope that is not the case."
"Does one merit gratitude for doing what their duty demands? Would these people act differently without your show of appreciation? I hope that is not the case."
"Does one merit gratitude for doing what their duty demands? Would these people act differently without your show of appreciation? I hope that is not the case."

languages.text: «¿Acaso merece alguien gratitud por cumplir con su deber? ¿Esta gente actuaría de otra forma si no les mostrara reconocimiento? Espero que no sea así».
languages.original_text: "Does one merit gratitude for doing what their duty demands? Would these people act differently without your show of appreciation? I hope that is not the case."

traits.locale_text: «¿Acaso merece alguien gratitud por cumplir con su deber? ¿Esta gente actuaría de otra forma si no les mostrara reconocimiento? Espero que no sea así».
«El estatus no es más que una herramienta para recorrer nuestro camino. Son los actos los que quedan grabados en el recuerdo».

languages.text: 「職務を全うすることに感謝を示す必要があるのでしょうか？あなたが感謝の意を示さなければ、この人たちは違った行動をとるのですか？そうでないことを願います」
languages.original_text: "Does one merit gratitude for doing what their duty demands? Would these people act differently without your show of appreciation? I hope that is not the case."

traits.locale_text: 「職務を全うすることに感謝を示す必要があるのでしょうか？あなたが感謝の意を示さなければ、この人たちは違った行動をとるのですか？そうでないことを願います」
「地位は自分の道を歩むための道具に過ぎない。永久にあなたの印や記憶となるのは、あなたの行いよ」

languages.text: “他们不过是做了职责要求的事情，这值得感激吗？如果没有你的感激，他们就不再会履行职责了吗？我希望真实情况并非如我所想。”
languages.original_text: "Does one merit gratitude for doing what their duty demands? Would these people act differently without your show of appreciation? I hope that is not the case."

traits.locale_text: “他们不过是做了职责要求的事情，这值得感激吗？如果没有你的感激，他们就不再会履行职责了吗？我希望真实情况并非如我所想。”
“社会地位仅仅是走在道路上的工具而已，只有你的行为才会为你打上印记，成为他者对你的记忆。”

languages.text: "Status ist nur ein Werkzeug, um den eigenen Weg zu beschreiten. Es sind Eure Taten, die Euch ewiges Gedenken einbringen."
languages.original_text: "Status is merely a tool for walking one's way. It is your deeds that will forever be your mark and memory."

traits.locale_text: "Status ist nur ein Werkzeug, um den eigenen Weg zu beschreiten. Es sind Eure Taten, die Euch ewiges Gedenken einbringen."
"Status ist nur ein Werkzeug, um den eigenen Weg zu beschreiten. Es sind Eure Taten, die Euch ewiges Gedenken einbringen."

languages.text: « Mérite-t-on la gratitude quand on se contente de faire son devoir ? Ces gens agiraient-ils autrement sans cette manifestation de votre reconnaissance ? J'ose espérer que non. »
languages.original_text: "Does one merit gratitude for doing what their duty demands? Would these people act differently without your show of appreciation? I hope that is not the case."

traits.locale_text: « Mérite-t-on la gratitude quand on se contente de faire son devoir ? Ces gens agiraient-ils autrement sans cette manifestation de votre reconnaissance ? J'ose espérer que non. »
« Le statut n'est guère qu'un outil nous permettant de suivre la voie qui est la nôtre. Seuls vos faits et gestes marqueront à jamais l'histoire de votre empreinte. »
